name: Mirrorgrid Demo Importer
author: Mirrorgrid Store

sections.description:
ToolKit for Mirrorgrid themes and demo content importer for themes.

This plugin will create a page in APPEARANCE > Import Demo Content.

If you are not using our(mirrorgrid’s) official theme, then you will be presented with three file upload inputs.

License

Mirrorgrid Demo Importer uses ‘One Click Demo Import’ plugin script
https://github.com/proteusthemes/one-click-demo-import

sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’,
  2. Search for ‘Mirrorgrid Demo Importer’ and install the plugin.
  3. Activate ‘Mirrorgrid Demo Importer’ from your Plugins page.

Once the plugin is activated you will find the actual import page in Appearance -> Import Demo Content.
sections.faq:
I have activated the plugin. Where is the “Import Demo Data” page?

You will find the import page in wp-admin -> Appearance -> Import Demo Data.

Where are the demo import files saved?

If you are using our official theme then no need to worry about demo content, just click on demo import button, it’ll work automatically.
